items.title: Heat can age you as much as smoking, a new study finds
items.description: Exposure to heat can alter the way your DNA works, according to a new study. The effects could lead to long-term health outcomes.

items.title: Peruvian farmer goes head to head with German energy giant in climate test case
items.description: A Peruvian farmer is going head to head with German energy giant in a climate law test case.
